nodes.text: The Temple of Korman Lao was a planet-sized temple for Korman Lao, the Lord Ravager of the Kanzer Exiles.

It was located somewhere in the Unknown Regions, near the Valtaullu Rift. At some point in history, it was somehow destroyed, and reduced to being an asteroid belt, though at least some of the knowledge it contained within survived. Cronal journeyed to there and discovered knowledge that he subsequently used to summon the spirit of the Sith King Dathka Graush.
